text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to write a letter for change of address?
text.Response A:
Look for a business letter template.
Create a mailing list.
Set up address blocks.
Provide a greeting.
Complete your closing.
Write a brief introduction.
Provide a date when the change will take place.
List your new address.
Include any other relevant information.
Thank the recipient.
Provide a means of contact.
Craft several letters.
Proofread your letter carefully.
Make sure the recipients' information is correct.
Print and sign your letters.
Provide your recipients with advance notice.
text.Response B:
Sure.  You can use this template:

Dear [insert name of addressee here]:

Please update your records to show my new address, which is:

[insert new address here]

Sincerely,

[your name]

781.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to write a letter for change of address?

Response A

Look for a business letter template.
Create a mailing list.
Set up address blocks.
Provide a greeting.
Complete your closing.
Write a brief introduction.
Provide a date when the change will take place.
List your new address.
Include any other relevant information.
Thank the recipient.
Provide a means of contact.
Craft several letters.
Proofread your letter carefully.
Make sure the recipients' information is correct.
Print and sign your letters.
Provide your recipients with advance notice.

Response B

Sure. You can use this template:

Dear [insert name of addressee here]:

Please update your records to show my new address, which is:

[insert new address here]

Sincerely,

[your name]
